question: @amazingphil
answer:
…I don’t know what I expected here.


10/10 human. Would commit a large portion of my life to obsessing over him/ being a thirsty bitch. Occasionally posts a fire selfie or reposts some quality fan art <3

blog.name: freeunicornhugs
blog.title: ~like riding a bike bebe~
blog.description:
I'm Unicorn Dorkington, but you can call me Unicorn or Uni~🦄 My blog is a mess...it can range from me crying over random gays, to any stuffy stuff I find interesting~ emo soft genderfluid lad~ ∩(^ω^)∩✿♡ A rainbow always comes after the rain~༄( happy Pride Month~ ^\\^ )

Wattpad: freeunicornhugs

Insta: freeunicornhugs

Twitter: freeunicornhug

body:
Right here, is going to be a POSITIVE RANT, no negativity~ And don’t bring any negativity towards it~ If you don’t like or agree with this post, then idk have a great day~ You’re awesome~ 😂💕

❤️🧡💛💚💙💜

Now…I just wanted to make a small ( hahaha small THATS FUNNY UNI ) rant on how HAPPY I am right now, in the case of the Phandom~! It appears that the hiatus is ( for the most part ) over~!! EEEEEEEE OMCHEE~!!! ヽ(＾▽＾)ﾉ I would love to congratulate, and give a pat on the back to EVERYONE who made it through this hiatus~! If you lost some hope along the way, don’t feel bad. As long as you know now that everything is okay~ If you still don’t have much hope in them, I just want you to remember all they’ve done for us, and maybe that’ll reassure you with the fact that they care too much for us to leave in such an unexpected or silent way~ To those who left the Phandom due to simple dissinterest, I would like to thank you for being a part of our fandom while you did~ I’m sure you blessed so many fellow fans with your presence~ ^_^ Now…if you tend to “hate on”, or “tease” Dan, Phil, or their fandom, pleeease move on from this post, and read something else. I don’t know why you choose to be negative towards them ( if you are that person ), but just know that you are valid, whether I agree or not. Maybe go and look at things that make you happy, and happy Pride month if you celebrate it~ :) And NOW ( I feel like I’m saying now a lot lol ), I’m going to say what I think is next. I will be discussing Phan, so if you do not like the ship, there are plenty other posts you can read, ignore this~ Maybe watch the YouTube channel Rapid Liquid~ Just a bunch of happy doggos~ So if you don’t ship it, move on from this post, and have a great day~ I respect u~uwu now…here I go~

🌼🌸🌻

So…the future is almost here. “Now, onto the future” is close. What exactly do I think the future holds? Well…my Phan-loving heart has soooo many ideas of possibilities~ So warning, this will be mostly Phan~ XD

🌈

So Dan’s coming video, as of this month, has a lot of possibilities as to what it could be, but I personally feel it will probably be either an update video, a storytime video on his hiatus, and/or a mental health video~ I know what you’re thinking: but if you ship Phan so hard, why don’t you think it’ll be a coming out video? Well, obviously most of us want that, just to have clarification on whether our shipping has been right all along, but honestly…I really don’t think him or Phil would make a coming out video. Because I feel they don’t need it. Honestly…I truly believe they are in a relationship. I see no proof against it. They would’ve said otherwise by now. I am not sure of anything, and I would never confront the subject to Dan or Phil unless they brought it up first. But knowing Dan and Phil, I feel as if they know their fans so well. They know what we’re thinking. They knew what we wanted at Interactive Introverts. And I feel…as if they know we know? And they feel no need to confront the subject any further, or publically. I think I’ve said this before, but I feel that if they are in a relationship, they don’t want to make it a huge deal. They don’t want it to be their channels. I feel they wouldn’t want to do couple tags or “the chapstick challenge”, or all those videos that are expected of YouTubers in relationships. I feel they just want it to be a part of their life, and not the whole of other’s lives on the internet. I’d think they don’t want their channels to say “hey we’re a perfect couple”, they want their channels to be “hey be happy”. If they are in a relationship, it means they haven’t wanted to show it off, and honestly…that’s such an honourable quality~ Not many people do that~ They want their lives to be their lives, not their lives to be their channels. The hiatus…I feel it was all about clarifying what they want for themselves. Showing the Phandom that they want to draw a line between personal life and the internet. To me, it almost seems like this hiatus was…a message. A message to us saying “we want our audience to be happy, and not concerned with no more than themselves”. Damn…I see that as such a power move~ I respect that so hard~ So, to get back to my point, I think though filmed in pride month, it wont be a coming out video. I think it’ll be a storytime of his hiatus, with mental health implements, and maybe subtle hints to the possible relationship, as it’s always been, under the radar~ Slight mention of it may be there, but no huge amount of aftention, and…just again, I frickin respect that so hard~ Honestly…if I were in a relationship and did YouTube, I’d treat it just as Dan and Phil have ( if a relationship is the case between them )~ I just sneezed like six times wow…my nose tingles ANYWAYS.

🌈

Now…after VIDCON? What is to come you may say~? Well, I have some fun thoughts~! Well first of all, there is a theory that they are moving/have moved into a FOREVER HOME~! OMCHEE I love the theory so muuuuuch~! And honestly…there’s almost too much evidence for it to not be true~! Again, I’m not sure of anything, but…my goodness the evidence~! OwO Some examples include: Phil’s new video background, Dan being on hiatus, the gaming channel having been on hiatus ( because maybe both Dan and the gaming channel are working on a new setup, and Phil’s new background shows nothing but a wall ), Phil filming in the kitchen that one time only partially ( because it is said to typically be the last place to be unpacked ), the bed thing with the black bed frame in Phil’s vid, Phil going to a self storage, and mentioning he is going to revisit, and just Phil staying in his filming spot for video stuff in general ( the face scanning, the cereal thing..etc ). There is more evidence, but goodness this post is getting long~ XD ANYWAYS SO YEAH I BELIEVE THAT THEY MAY HAVE OR MAY BE GETTING A FOREVER HOME~ YAYAYAYAYYAY~ （＾ω＾）

🌈

Next idea issss that THEY MAY GET A DOG~!!! Aaaaaaa~! Well, first of all, I think the main reason Dan and Phil haven’t got a dog yet, is because they aren’t allowed to have dogs in their flat. So…if the forever home theory is true, THEN THEY COULD GET A DOGGO~! And the biggest piece of evidence, is…I mean, have you SEEN how much the subject of “dogs” have come up on Phil’s channel, insta/twitter likes, and merch? HALF HIS BRANDING IS CORGIS~! I mean…wouldn’t him getting a corgi complete his esemble~? He has his houseplants, now…he just needs a corgi~ And of course, if Phil gets a corgi IT’LL BE DAN’S TOOOO~ Dan mentioned in a live show a few years ago how much Phil loves corgis, and even mentioned him wanting one, so honestly I think Dan would TOTALLY be up for it~ Then maybe a Shibe later along the waaay~? (^｡^) Anyways I THINK THEY MAY GET A DOGGO AND I’M EXICTED~

🌈

The future of their channels? Honestly…I don’t know, but I’m excited~ Phil’s channel, I don’t have any idea honestly,but I just know it’s always going to be a place of happiness and silliness~ I have a feeling he won’t change it too much…he’s too perfect~ 😂 MAYBEEEE he will do a few deeper meaningful videos, but since I think he wants his channel to be an escape from life, I feel he may stick more to simple joyful entertainment and childish wonder as he always has~ (*´｡`) And it seems that Dan’s channel is becoming more informal and philosophical, so maybe he’ll become a mental health advocate of YouTube?? Who knows~?? Or he’ll just stick with comedy like his past?? OR MIX ITTT?? Who knows, I’m just excited~ :) MAYBE THAT WRITER’S RETREAT HE TOOK HAS TO DO WITH HIS CHANNEL~ MAYBE HE’LL WRITE BOOKS AND NARRATE THEM~ isjjdjsjKSNCJDKS YAAAS~ I’m going to talk about that retreat real quick~

🌈

So you saw Dan at that retreat right~? Where he wouldn’t stop being so damn BEAUTIFUL AND SOPHISTICATED WITH HIS MOTH SHIRT AND BLACK JAKCET SUIT THING~? Yep, that~ I heard that he may be doing a PODCAST WHICH WOULD GIVE ME LIIIIFE~!! I believe he could write a book too~ He’d be a wonderful writer~ He’s so articulate, and is AMAZING at executing his thoughts in a very convincing and beautiful way~ uwu

🌈

Now…what about Dan and Phil games~? WHERE IS THAT GOING?? Simple: Dan and Phil will…keep playing games~（＾∇＾）♡ Oooh maybe they’ll add more board games~! They played lots of them during the hiatus. LIKE THAT ONE WITH THE CARDS AND- idk they played two board games and I think it’d be AWESOME if they did them as gaming videos~ XD

🌈

Is there anything elseeee??? Ah yes, one more thing~! Where do I think they may travel next~? Well MAINLY, I think they will ( and MUST ) visit JAPAN AGAIN~! JAPHAN WAS SUCH AN ICONIC EVENT, AND TO RECREATE, OR UPDATE IT WOULD BE LEGENDARY~ Who knows, MAYBE THEY COULD MOVE THERE- I mean…SORRY MY PHAN DREAMS JUMPED OUT OF MY HEAD HAHAHA…MAYBE THEY’LL BECOME TRAVELING HUSBANDS BECAUSE PHIL IS FOLLOWING TWO ACCOUNTS MADE BY TRAVELING HUSBANDS WHO POST PHOTOS AROUND THE WORLD IN THE GAYEST AND MOST BEAUTIFUL WAY POSSIBLE-SORRY SORRY…JUST A THOUGHT…KAY I’M GOING TO END THIS RANT BEFORE I TALK TOO MUCH…wat am I saying I already have…😂😂😂

🌻🌸🌼

Anywaysss that is all my thoughts on what may come in the future~! This post turned out so long, I have a feeling this won’t be reblogged ever…too much scrolling~ （＾∇＾） ANYWAYS what do you think the future holds~? Let me know if you’d like~! And if you reeeally want to, and for some reason like long posts, maybe reblog and add onto this~! We could make the WORLD’S LONGEST PHANDOM TUMBLR POSSTT~ 😱

.

ANYWAAAYS I LOVE YOU TO MARS AND BACK, EAT YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, WATCH CUTE ANIMAL VIDEOS, SMILE YOUR BEAUTIFUL SMILE, REMEMBER YOU DESERVE HAPPINESS, AND HAPPY PRIDE MOOOONTH~~!!! 💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙂🙂

🌈❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🌈

Who knows, I’m just excited~ :) MAYBE THAT WRITER’S RETREAT HE TOOK HAS TO DO WITH HIS CHANNEL~ MAYBE HE’LL WRITE BOOKS AND NARRATE THEM~ isjjdjsjKSNCJDKS YAAAS~ I’m going to talk about that retreat real quick~

🌈

So you saw Dan at that retreat right~? Where he wouldn’t stop being so damn BEAUTIFUL AND SOPHISTICATED WITH HIS MOTH SHIRT AND BLACK JAKCET SUIT THING~? Yep, that~ I heard that he may be doing a PODCAST WHICH WOULD GIVE ME LIIIIFE~!! I believe he could write a book too~ He’d be a wonderful writer~ He’s so articulate, and is AMAZING at executing his thoughts in a very convincing and beautiful way~ uwu

🌈

Now…what about Dan and Phil games~? WHERE IS THAT GOING?? Simple: Dan and Phil will…keep playing games~（＾∇＾）♡ Oooh maybe they’ll add more board games~! They played lots of them during the hiatus. LIKE THAT ONE WITH THE CARDS AND- idk they played two board games and I think it’d be AWESOME if they did them as gaming videos~ XD

🌈

Is there anything elseeee??? Ah yes, one more thing~! Where do I think they may travel next~? Well MAINLY, I think they will ( and MUST ) visit JAPAN AGAIN~! JAPHAN WAS SUCH AN ICONIC EVENT, AND TO RECREATE, OR UPDATE IT WOULD BE LEGENDARY~ Who knows, MAYBE THEY COULD MOVE THERE- I mean…SORRY MY PHAN DREAMS JUMPED OUT OF MY HEAD HAHAHA…MAYBE THEY’LL BECOME TRAVELING HUSBANDS BECAUSE PHIL IS FOLLOWING TWO ACCOUNTS MADE BY TRAVELING HUSBANDS WHO POST PHOTOS AROUND THE WORLD IN THE GAYEST AND MOST BEAUTIFUL WAY POSSIBLE-SORRY SORRY…JUST A THOUGHT…KAY I’M GOING TO END THIS RANT BEFORE I TALK TOO MUCH…wat am I saying I already have…😂😂😂

🌻🌸🌼

Anywaysss that is all my thoughts on what may come in the future~! This post turned out so long, I have a feeling this won’t be reblogged ever…too much scrolling~ （＾∇＾） ANYWAYS what do you think the future holds~? Let me know if you’d like~! And if you reeeally want to, and for some reason like long posts, maybe reblog and add onto this~! We could make the WORLD’S LONGEST PHANDOM TUMBLR POSSTT~ 😱

.

ANYWAAAYS I LOVE YOU TO MARS AND BACK, EAT YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, WATCH CUTE ANIMAL VIDEOS, SMILE YOUR BEAUTIFUL SMILE, REMEMBER YOU DESERVE HAPPINESS, AND HAPPY PRIDE MOOOONTH~~!!! 💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙂🙂

🌈❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🌈

trail.content_raw:
Right here, is going to be a POSITIVE RANT, no negativity~ And don’t bring any negativity towards it~ If you don’t like or agree with this post, then idk have a great day~ You’re awesome~ 😂💕

❤️🧡💛💚💙💜

Now…I just wanted to make a small ( hahaha small THATS FUNNY UNI ) rant on how HAPPY I am right now, in the case of the Phandom~! It appears that the hiatus is ( for the most part ) over~!! EEEEEEEE OMCHEE~!!! ヽ(＾▽＾)ﾉ I would love to congratulate, and give a pat on the back to EVERYONE who made it through this hiatus~! If you lost some hope along the way, don’t feel bad. As long as you know now that everything is okay~ If you still don’t have much hope in them, I just want you to remember all they’ve done for us, and maybe that’ll reassure you with the fact that they care too much for us to leave in such an unexpected or silent way~ To those who left the Phandom due to simple dissinterest, I would like to thank you for being a part of our fandom while you did~ I’m sure you blessed so many fellow fans with your presence~ ^_^ Now…if you tend to “hate on”, or “tease” Dan, Phil, or their fandom, pleeease move on from this post, and read something else. I don’t know why you choose to be negative towards them ( if you are that person ), but just know that you are valid, whether I agree or not. Maybe go and look at things that make you happy, and happy Pride month if you celebrate it~ :) And NOW ( I feel like I’m saying now a lot lol ), I’m going to say what I think is next. I will be discussing Phan, so if you do not like the ship, there are plenty other posts you can read, ignore this~ Maybe watch the YouTube channel Rapid Liquid~ Just a bunch of happy doggos~ So if you don’t ship it, move on from this post, and have a great day~ I respect u~uwu now…here I go~

🌼🌸🌻

So…the future is almost here. “Now, onto the future” is close. What exactly do I think the future holds? Well…my Phan-loving heart has soooo many ideas of possibilities~ So warning, this will be mostly Phan~ XD

🌈

So Dan’s coming video, as of this month, has a lot of possibilities as to what it could be, but I personally feel it will probably be either an update video, a storytime video on his hiatus, and/or a mental health video~ I know what you’re thinking: but if you ship Phan so hard, why don’t you think it’ll be a coming out video? Well, obviously most of us want that, just to have clarification on whether our shipping has been right all along, but honestly…I really don’t think him or Phil would make a coming out video. Because I feel they don’t need it. Honestly…I truly believe they are in a relationship. I see no proof against it. They would’ve said otherwise by now. I am not sure of anything, and I would never confront the subject to Dan or Phil unless they brought it up first. But knowing Dan and Phil, I feel as if they know their fans so well. They know what we’re thinking. They knew what we wanted at Interactive Introverts. And I feel…as if they know we know? And they feel no need to confront the subject any further, or publically. I think I’ve said this before, but I feel that if they are in a relationship, they don’t want to make it a huge deal. They don’t want it to be their channels. I feel they wouldn’t want to do couple tags or “the chapstick challenge”, or all those videos that are expected of YouTubers in relationships. I feel they just want it to be a part of their life, and not the whole of other’s lives on the internet. I’d think they don’t want their channels to say “hey we’re a perfect couple”, they want their channels to be “hey be happy”. If they are in a relationship, it means they haven’t wanted to show it off, and honestly…that’s such an honourable quality~ Not many people do that~ They want their lives to be their lives, not their lives to be their channels. The hiatus…I feel it was all about clarifying what they want for themselves. Showing the Phandom that they want to draw a line between personal life and the internet. To me, it almost seems like this hiatus was…a message. A message to us saying “we want our audience to be happy, and not concerned with no more than themselves”. Damn…I see that as such a power move~ I respect that so hard~ So, to get back to my point, I think though filmed in pride month, it wont be a coming out video. I think it’ll be a storytime of his hiatus, with mental health implements, and maybe subtle hints to the possible relationship, as it’s always been, under the radar~ Slight mention of it may be there, but no huge amount of aftention, and…just again, I frickin respect that so hard~ Honestly…if I were in a relationship and did YouTube, I’d treat it just as Dan and Phil have ( if a relationship is the case between them )~ I just sneezed like six times wow…my nose tingles ANYWAYS.

🌈

Now…after VIDCON? What is to come you may say~? Well, I have some fun thoughts~! Well first of all, there is a theory that they are moving/have moved into a FOREVER HOME~! OMCHEE I love the theory so muuuuuch~! And honestly…there’s almost too much evidence for it to not be true~! Again, I’m not sure of anything, but…my goodness the evidence~! OwO Some examples include: Phil’s new video background, Dan being on hiatus, the gaming channel having been on hiatus ( because maybe both Dan and the gaming channel are working on a new setup, and Phil’s new background shows nothing but a wall ), Phil filming in the kitchen that one time only partially ( because it is said to typically be the last place to be unpacked ), the bed thing with the black bed frame in Phil’s vid, Phil going to a self storage, and mentioning he is going to revisit, and just Phil staying in his filming spot for video stuff in general ( the face scanning, the cereal thing..etc ). There is more evidence, but goodness this post is getting long~ XD ANYWAYS SO YEAH I BELIEVE THAT THEY MAY HAVE OR MAY BE GETTING A FOREVER HOME~ YAYAYAYAYYAY~ （＾ω＾）

🌈

Next idea issss that THEY MAY GET A DOG~!!! Aaaaaaa~! Well, first of all, I think the main reason Dan and Phil haven’t got a dog yet, is because they aren’t allowed to have dogs in their flat. So…if the forever home theory is true, THEN THEY COULD GET A DOGGO~! And the biggest piece of evidence, is…I mean, have you SEEN how much the subject of “dogs” have come up on Phil’s channel, insta/twitter likes, and merch? HALF HIS BRANDING IS CORGIS~! I mean…wouldn’t him getting a corgi complete his esemble~? He has his houseplants, now…he just needs a corgi~ And of course, if Phil gets a corgi IT’LL BE DAN’S TOOOO~ Dan mentioned in a live show a few years ago how much Phil loves corgis, and even mentioned him wanting one, so honestly I think Dan would TOTALLY be up for it~ Then maybe a Shibe later along the waaay~? (^｡^) Anyways I THINK THEY MAY GET A DOGGO AND I’M EXICTED~

🌈

The future of their channels? Honestly…I don’t know, but I’m excited~ Phil’s channel, I don’t have any idea honestly,but I just know it’s always going to be a place of happiness and silliness~ I have a feeling he won’t change it too much…he’s too perfect~ 😂 MAYBEEEE he will do a few deeper meaningful videos, but since I think he wants his channel to be an escape from life, I feel he may stick more to simple joyful entertainment and childish wonder as he always has~ (*´｡`) And it seems that Dan’s channel is becoming more informal and philosophical, so maybe he’ll become a mental health advocate of YouTube?? Who knows~?? Or he’ll just stick with comedy like his past?? OR MIX ITTT?? Who knows, I’m just excited~ :) MAYBE THAT WRITER’S RETREAT HE TOOK HAS TO DO WITH HIS CHANNEL~ MAYBE HE’LL WRITE BOOKS AND NARRATE THEM~ isjjdjsjKSNCJDKS YAAAS~ I’m going to talk about that retreat real quick~

🌈

So you saw Dan at that retreat right~? Where he wouldn’t stop being so damn BEAUTIFUL AND SOPHISTICATED WITH HIS MOTH SHIRT AND BLACK JAKCET SUIT THING~? Yep, that~ I heard that he may be doing a PODCAST WHICH WOULD GIVE ME LIIIIFE~!! I believe he could write a book too~ He’d be a wonderful writer~ He’s so articulate, and is AMAZING at executing his thoughts in a very convincing and beautiful way~ uwu

🌈

Now…what about Dan and Phil games~? WHERE IS THAT GOING?? Simple: Dan and Phil will…keep playing games~（＾∇＾）♡ Oooh maybe they’ll add more board games~! They played lots of them during the hiatus. LIKE THAT ONE WITH THE CARDS AND- idk they played two board games and I think it’d be AWESOME if they did them as gaming videos~ XD

🌈

Is there anything elseeee??? Ah yes, one more thing~! Where do I think they may travel next~? Well MAINLY, I think they will ( and MUST ) visit JAPAN AGAIN~! JAPHAN WAS SUCH AN ICONIC EVENT, AND TO RECREATE, OR UPDATE IT WOULD BE LEGENDARY~ Who knows, MAYBE THEY COULD MOVE THERE- I mean…SORRY MY PHAN DREAMS JUMPED OUT OF MY HEAD HAHAHA…MAYBE THEY’LL BECOME TRAVELING HUSBANDS BECAUSE PHIL IS FOLLOWING TWO ACCOUNTS MADE BY TRAVELING HUSBANDS WHO POST PHOTOS AROUND THE WORLD IN THE GAYEST AND MOST BEAUTIFUL WAY POSSIBLE-SORRY SORRY…JUST A THOUGHT…KAY I’M GOING TO END THIS RANT BEFORE I TALK TOO MUCH…wat am I saying I already have…😂😂😂

🌻🌸🌼

Anywaysss that is all my thoughts on what may come in the future~! This post turned out so long, I have a feeling this won’t be reblogged ever…too much scrolling~ （＾∇＾） ANYWAYS what do you think the future holds~? Let me know if you’d like~! And if you reeeally want to, and for some reason like long posts, maybe reblog and add onto this~! We could make the WORLD’S LONGEST PHANDOM TUMBLR POSSTT~ 😱

.

ANYWAAAYS I LOVE YOU TO MARS AND BACK, EAT YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD, WATCH CUTE ANIMAL VIDEOS, SMILE YOUR BEAUTIFUL SMILE, REMEMBER YOU DESERVE HAPPINESS, AND HAPPY PRIDE MOOOONTH~~!!! 💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕💕🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙃🙂🙂🙂
